title: 86/438/EEC: Commission Decision of 20 June 1986 on the clearance of the accounts presented by the French Republic in respect of the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund, Guarantee Section, expenditure for 1982 (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 20 June 1986
on the clearance of the accounts presented by the French Republic in respect of the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund, Guarantee Section, expenditure for 1982
(Only the French text is authentic)
(86/438/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
(1) The expenditure by the French Republic recognized as chargeable to the European Agricultural Guidance and Guarantee Fund, Guarantee Section, in respect of the 1982 financial year amounts, in accordance with Annex I, to FF 17 968 891 041,73.
(2) The expenditure recognized as chargeable to the EAGGF pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 1078/77 amounts, in accordance with Annex II, to FF 130 362 781,99.
The financial resources available at the end of 1982 amount, in accordance with Annex I, to FF 284 105 154,88 and, in accordance with Annex II, to FF 1 802 637,91.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 June 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
